A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie had it's problems\, but at it's core\, it was what it was suppose to be... a Star Wars film. I loved every moment\, even the weirdly paced or out of place bits. I loved Luke\, I LOVED Kylo\, I loved Leia\, I loved Poe\, I even loved Rose. 

The people giving this a low score obviously only want a needless giant battle scene. They don't seem to understand character development\, they don't seem to understand the message. Was Luke a bit weird? Yes. But we all saw Yoda towards the end of his life. He wasn't exactly the wise and calm person he was in his early years. We can't expect this man who has been through so much\, who has been living ALONE to be 'normal' can we?

I have a lot more I wanna say but honestly\, I think this movie should be given more of a chance then it is.
